 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפִינָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==vessel, ship== (***covered in, overlaid***, with sheathing, deck, etc.; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; on Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word see [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>216</sup>); — only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְכְּתַי הַסּ‎</span> [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]].
